backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with cruise deals, itineraries, reviews, bookings, branding settings, admin alerts, shareable links, and access control using several mixins and in-memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required update to Hero component and listing related files, components, tests, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text mapping frontend file paths to short functional descriptions of each component, hook, or config file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme variables for light and dark mode with OKLCH values and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell containing root element and script tag loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that detects share links and conditionally renders either the shared itinerary page or the standard homepage layout.
Shows toast notifications for new unviewed admin alerts when the caller is an admin.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboardDi: Admin dashboard dialog showing alerts, bookings, logo management, and branding settings with tabbed navigation and auto-marking alerts as viewed.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Admin settings dialog for viewing user role, principal ID, live link info, and assigning admin privileges.
frontend/src/components/AppStatusLiveLin: Displays the current app URL with copy/open actions and shows backend diagnostics including version and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Provides a booking dialog allowing users to select cabins, view pricing, and submit a trip reservation.
frontend/src/components/CruiseCard.tsx: Renders a cruise deal card with images, details, favorite toggling, and itinerary viewing.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLineLogosM: Admin interface for adding, updating, previewing, and deleting cruise line logos.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLinePartne: Displays a grid of cruise line partner logos with loading skeletons and fallback states.
Shows a dialog listing the user’s favorite cruise deals with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedDeals.ts: Fetches and displays featured cruise deals in an auto‑advancing carousel with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation links, destination lists, social icons, and branding. Includes contact info and a copyright note.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main site header with navigation, authentication handling, admin actions, and dialogs for favorites and bookings. Supports both desktop and mobile menus.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays a full‑screen hero section with a background image, gradient overlays, call‑to‑action buttons, and highlight stats. Handles image loading and error states.
Shows detailed cruise itinerary info with tabs, reviews, booking actions, sharing, and PDF generation. Fetches itinerary data and manages related UI state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new authenticated users to enter their name and saves their profile. Prevents dismissal until required info is submitted.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Handles viewing, creating, editing, and deleting cruise reviews with rating controls. Uses authentication to manage user-specific review actions.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Search UI with filters, debounced query, and dynamic cruise deal fetching and display.
frontend/src/components/SharedItineraryP: Renders a public itinerary page with branding, loading/error states, and itinerary details.
frontend/src/components/SharedPageBrandi: Admin tab for viewing, editing, and resetting shared-page branding settings.
frontend/src/components/UserBookingsDial: Modal showing the user's bookings with status, itinerary info, and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook that returns a debounced version of a given value.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor methods for fetching and mutating cruise deals, itineraries, and filtered searches with normalization helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and extensive theme variables defining light/dark palettes and custom ocean/sunset color utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/colorValidation.ts: Utility functions for validating CSS colors, providing safe fallbacks, and applying validated color styles.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryPdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML-based PDF view of an itinerary by opening a styled print window.
frontend/src/utils/sharedItineraryBrandi: Merges customizable branding settings with defaults for shared itinerary pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL and sessionStorage utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, plugins, and theme extensions tied to CSS variable–based color palettes.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, required images, and feature requests for fixing the homepage Hero image. Contains metadata about existing and new feature requirements for the Next Time Vacations project.
